title_en: Nutritional Status of Children Under 5 by Strata
title_ms: Status Nutrisi Kanak-Kanak bawah 5 Tahun mengikut Strata
description_en: Distribution of weight-for-age (WAZ), height-for-age (HAZ), and weight-for-height (WHZ) scores for children under 5 years old based on WHO standards, which are used to assess malnutrition (underweight, stunting, wasting, and obesity).
description_ms: Taburan skor berat-untuk-umur (WAZ), tinggi-untuk-umur (HAZ), dan berat-untuk-tinggi (WHZ) untuk kanak-kanak bawah 5 tahun berdasarkan piawaian WHO, yang digunakan untuk menilai malnutrisi (kekurangan berat badan, terbantut, tersusut dan obesiti).
methodology_en:
This data is tabulated based on survey records collected via the National Health and Morbidity Survey (NHMS), which is conducted by the Ministry of Health once every 4 years. The NHMS is design to collect representative data on various healthcare outcomes, especially those which cannot be assessed through administrative hospital data. For a fuller description of the methodology, please refer to the [NHMS 2019 report](https://storage.data.gov.my/healthcare/nhms_2019.pdf).

For this dataset specifically, the distributions of WAZ, HAZ and WHZ for Malaysia were calculated by comparing the weights and heights of children under 5 years old to the World Health Organization Growth Standard 2006 (WHO 2006). Following that, the prevalence of 4 key malnutrition indicators is defined as follows:

- Underweight: Weight-for-age (WAZ) less than 2 standard deviations below the median
- Stunting: Height-for-age (HAZ) less than 2 standard deviations below the median
- Wasting: Weight-for-height (WHZ) less than 2 standard deviations below the median
- Obesity: Weight-for-height (WHZ) more than 2 standard deviations above the median
methodology_ms:
Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan rekod tinjauan yang dikumpul melalui Tinjauan Kesihatan dan Morbiditi Kebangsaan (NHMS), yang dilaksanakan oleh Kementerian Kesihatan setiap 4 tahun. NHMS dirangka untuk mengumpul data representatif bagi pelbagai indikator kesihatan, terutamanya yang tidak dapat dinilai melalui data pentadbiran. Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, sila rujuk laporan [NHMS 2019](https://storage.data.gov.my/healthcare/nhms_2019.pdf).

Bagi set data ini secara khusus, taburan WAZ, HAZ, dan WHZ bagi Malaysia telah dikira dengan membandingkan berat dan umur kanak-kanak bawah 5 tahun di Malaysia kepada _World Health Organization Growth Standard 2006 (WHO 2006)_. Kemudian, prevalen 4 indikator malnutrisi penting dikira seperti berikut:

- Kekurangan berat badan: Berat-untuk-umur (WAZ) kurang daripada 2 sisihan piawai di bawah median
- Terbantut: Tinggi-untuk-umur (HAZ) kurang daripada 2 sisihan piawai di bawah median
- Tersusut: Berat-untuk-tinggi (WHZ) kurang daripada 2 sisihan piawai di bawah median
- Obesiti: Berat-untuk-tinggi (WHZ) lebih daripada 2 sisihan piawai di atas median
caveat_en: These figures are based on the 2019 NHMS. Changes due to the pandemic will only be reflected in data based on the 2023 NHMS.
caveat_ms: Angka-angka ini adalah berdasarkan pada NHMS 2019. Perubahan yang disebabkan oleh pandemik hanya akan dicerminkan dalam data berdasarkan NHMS 2023.

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 as this is annual data
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD diberi nilai 01 kerana ini adalah data tahunan

fields.name: strata
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada keseluruhan ('all'), luar bandar ('rural'), atau bandar ('urban')

fields.name: indicator
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada berat-untuk-umur (WAZ), tinggi-untuk-umur (HAZ), atau berat-untuk-tinggi (WHZ)

fields.name: range
fields.description_en: [String] The range for the indicator (e.g., < -2SD, -2SD to 2SD, > 2SD).

fields.name: description
fields.description_en: [String] The interpretation of the range (e.g., Underweight, Normal, Overweight).
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Keterangan tentang julat indikator (contohnya Kekurangan berat badan, Normal, Berlebihan berat badan).

fields.name: prevalence
fields.description_en: [Float, %] The proportion of the population in the range, expressed as a percentage.
fields.description_ms: [Apung, %] Nisbah populasi dalam julat tersebut, dinyatakan sebagai peratusan.
